about_the_game:
Inspired by 90s Survival Horror and JRPGs
This game is a prequel to DEEP 8, which you can play for free on Steam.

Features

Fixed Cameras
Experience fixed camera angles that create tension by limiting your field of view while presenting scenes like paintings. Exploration becomes a rewarding adventure as you uncover hidden corners and secrets.

Turn-Based Battles
Relive the classic 90s JRPG vibe with modern touches. Engage in tactical, turn-based combat that challenges your strategy and efficiency as you face tough enemies and bosses.

World Map
Rediscover the charm of a connected, expansive world through a classic world map, making exploration feel vast and meaningful.

Graphics
The visuals are inspired by the PS2 era, focusing on charm over photorealism. Main characters feature detailed models, while animations are lovingly crafted by hand rather than motion-captured.

Story
Like its sequel, DEEP 8, Fille Fatale Compassion delves into dark and disturbing themes, but it doesn’t shy away from humor. Expect moments of comic relief to balance the intensity of its narrative.

content_descriptors.notes: Sensitive/triggering topics are addressed, including abuse, violence, drug abuse, homophobia, discriminatory slurs, BDSM, and implied nudity.

name: Fille Fatale Compassion
short_description: FFC is a retro-inspired JRPG with tactical battles. Help a young woman grow up and emancipate from her dark, traumatizing past.
